definition: to kill oneself/to commit suicide/to attempt suicide
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
to commit suicide to escape punishment

pinyin: zi4 sha1 zha4 dan4 sha1 shou3

definition: a death claimed to be a suicide by the authorities

sentences.english: He pulled a would-be suicide out of a river.
sentences.chinese: 他將一位自殺未遂者從河裏拖上來。

sentences.english: Othello loves his wife Desdemona, but throttles her mercilessly.
sentences.chinese: 奧塞羅愛妻子但卻殘忍地扼死了妻子並終於自殺。

sentences.english: The police said he self-painted it before he committed suicide.
sentences.chinese: 警方估計是他自殺前自己塗上的。

sentences.english: He says they'll use suicide bombers in their attacks.
sentences.chinese: 他說他們會在襲擊中使用自殺式炸彈。

sentences.english: Another worker slit his wrist and was hospitalized.
sentences.chinese: 另一名員工試圖割腕自殺，現在醫院安養。

sentences.english: We'll be reading his essay on suicide.Hume died,had an illness.
sentences.chinese: 讀到他關於自殺的論文，Hume死於疾病。

sentences.english: Wolowitz: You make me want to kill myself.
Chongzhen suicided together with a eunuch Wang Chengen.
sentences.chinese: 崇自殺連同一個太監王成恩。

sentences.english: Who is the last person Dualla sees before she shoots herself?
sentences.chinese: 在小杜自殺前，她看到的最後一個人是誰？

sentences.english: Just one of those states, West Virginia, is among the top 10 for suicides, ranking No. 8. The only other state in the top 20 was Kentucky at 16th.
sentences.chinese: 這些州中僅有西弗吉尼亞州的自殺率排在前十位。

sentences.english: In others, suicides in women who ingest pesticides need to be addressed.
sentences.chinese: 另一些國家則需要處理婦女吞食農藥自殺的問題。

sentences.english: The recidivism rate is very low.
sentences.chinese: 重新犯罪率很低，但自殺率很高。

sentences.english: Then using any of the methods above, kill yourself.
sentences.chinese: 然後使用上述任何一種方法，自殺。

sentences.english: Some people unluckily achieve suicide when they only meant to attempt it.
sentences.chinese: 一些人只是想嘗試一下自殺，但卻不幸真的身亡了。

sentences.english: In some countries, disgraced politicians kill them-selves.
sentences.chinese: 在有些國家，丟了臉的政客會自殺。

sentences.english: Many people were locked up - sometimes even killed or driven to suicide.
sentences.chinese: 許多人被關押，有時甚至被殺害，或者逼迫自殺。

definition: to doubt (sth)/to be skeptical of/to have one's doubts/to harbor suspicions/to suspect that
to be defeated/to lose/to fail (e.g. experiments)/failure/defeat/CL:次[ci4]
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
